content: Insecurity and fear of loss often stem from a deep-seated fear of abandonment or rejection. It's possible that despite ending the relationship and forcing you out, he still felt a strong emotional connection to you and was afraid of completely losing you. This fear could have caused him to try and exert control in various ways, including criticizing your appearance or accusing you of cheating, as a way of trying to keep you close. However, these behaviors are not healthy or acceptable in any relationship.
